resume.title: Software Developer
resume.description:
For all product UI's I maintained, implemented redesigns and added new features based on customer feedback.

I also worked on bugfixes for both ends of the stack, new features for the C# backend and creating internal documentation for new features and architecture choices

resume.title: Junior Developer
resume.description: Worked in the front-end team working on re-implementing the app in React Native. Responsibilities included implementing redesigns of the UI and creating native versions of various games based on their web counterparts.

resume.title: Software Developer
resume.description:
As part of Industry62 my main task involved front-end programming work for a pair of React Native mobile apps designed to deliver digital health services for pregnant women in Africa.

You can read more about the project <a href='https://www.industry62.com/case-stories/2019/5/8/myhealthhand' target='_blank'>here<a/>
